articles.title: Kim Jong Il Passes through Jilin Province, China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Passes through Jilin Province, China

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il, today passed through Jilin Province, China.
					
					 He arrived in Tonghua City, Jilin Province this morning.
					
					 Tonghua City is recorded in the brilliant history of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle of President Kim Il Sung. It is associated with his undying revolutionary relics as he waged a joint struggle with a unit of the Independence Army to form the Korean people's anti-Japanese national united front early in the 1930s.
					
					 Jilin Province where the DPRK-China friendship struck its deep roots is associated with the relics related to his visits to China in December 1950 and in September 1964.
					
					 When the train pulled in Tonghua Railway Station, he was warmly greeted by Sun Zhengcai, secretary of the Jilin Provincial Party Committee, Wang Yulin, governor of Jilin Province, Liu Baowei, secretary of Tonghua City Party Committee, Tian Wolin, mayor of Tonghua City, and other senior party and government officials of the province and the city.
					
					 Lovely children presented bouquets to him with words of warm welcome.
					
					  He was accompanied by Kim Yong Chun, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and minister of the People's Armed Forces, Kang Sok Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-premier of the Cabinet, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the NDC, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yang Gon, Pak To Chun and Thae Jong Su, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Pak Pong Ju, first vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, O Su Yong, chief secretary of the North Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Ji Jae Ryong, DPRK ambassador to China, and Ri Ki Bom, DPRK consul general in Shenyang.
					
					  He was also accompanied by Wang Jiarui, head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, Sheng Guangzu, minister of Railways, and other senior central officials.
					
					 He exchanged warm greetings with the officials present there to receive him and visited the Tonghua Wine Co. Ltd., conducted by them.
					
					 He recollected with deep emotion the noble footprints left by President Kim Il Sung when visiting the company nearly half a century ago.
					
					 He went round various places including the wine depot, its exhibition hall to learn in detail about the history of the company and its production system, storage of products and its taste. He wished the company greater progress in its work for the well-being of the people.
					
					 The party and government of the province hosted a grand banquet in honor of Kim Jong Il visiting the province.
					
					 He was present there on invitation.
					
					 Sun Zhengcai, secretary of the Jilin Provincial Party Committee, in his speech said it was particular privilege and honor for his province to receive Kim Jong Il three times in a little more than one year. He offered the highest regard and warm welcome to Kim Jong Il on behalf of the party, government and people of the province.
					
					 Noting that all the Chinese people including the people of the province are rejoiced as over their own over the successes made by the Korean people recently in their efforts to significantly commemorate the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung, Sun Zhengcai expressed expectation and belief that the Korean people would surely win a shining victory in the drive for building a prosperous and powerful socialist nation under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Sun noted that the party, government and people of the province would join the Korean people in playing a bigger role in inheriting and developing the Sino-DPRK friendship generation after generation. 
					
					 A performance was given in welcome of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Put on the stage were colorful numbers including female chorus "Waves of Honghe" and Korean songs "Embrace of Country," an immortal classic masterpiece, and mixed chorus "We Are Running on Chollima Steed."
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience.
					
					 He was presented with a gift by the provincial party and people's government this day in welcome of his visit to the province.
					
					 He expressed thanks for the warm reception and cordial hospitality accorded to him by the party, government and people of Jilin Province. He wished them a fresh success in their efforts for the prosperity of the country and the well-being of its people under the leadership of the CPC.
					
					 He wrapped up his long trip to Northeast China and left this day for the homeland where the beloved people are waiting for him.
					
					 Before his departure, he exchanged warm farewell greetings with central leading officials including Wang Jiarui and Sheng Guangzu who conducted him with sincerity in the whole period of his visit and leading officials of the party and government of the province and the city including Sun Zhengcai and Wang Yulin.
					
					 When the train started from the border station, the Chinese leading officials of central and local areas warmly sent him off, waving their hands.
					
					 His transit and visit to Northeast China successfully took place thanks to the particular concern of General Secretary Hu Jintao and the party, the government and the people of China.
					
					 He expressed his satisfaction over the results of his visit and expressed sincere thanks to the Central Committee of the CPC, the State Council and leading officials and the people of the Inner Mongolian Autonomous Region, Heilongjiang and Jilin provinces for the kind and cordial hospitality accorded to him.
					
					 His transit and visit to Northeast China will be brilliantly recorded in the history of the DPRK-China friendship as they marked another important occasion in powerfully demonstrating the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the parties and countries of the DPRK and China and consolidating the ties of friendship between the two peoples.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Returns Home after Winding Up His Visit to Russia and China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Returns Home after Winding Up His Visit to Russia and China

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, returned home Saturday, accompanied by the suite members, after successfully winding up his visit to the Russian Federation and the People's Republic of China.
					
					 He was warmly greeted at the border railway station by Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, and other senior party and army officials.
					
					 The senior party and army officials, carrying the unanimous best wishes of all the service persons and people, presented a basket of flowers to Kim Jong Il who returned home safely after performing immortal feats through his external activities to be recorded in the history of prosperity of the socialist country through his long journey covering more than 8 000 km and warmly congratulated him on his successful foreign tours.
					
					 He met with the senior party and army officials present there and extended a warm salute to all beloved people of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Message of Thanks to Hu Jintao
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Message of Thanks to Hu Jintao

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, Saturday sent a message of thanks to Hu Jintao, general secretary  of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and president of the People's Republic of China, on his way home after visiting  Northeast China.
					
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend warm greetings to you, the close comrades of the collective leadership of the Communist Party of China and the fraternal Chinese people on my way home after visiting Northeast China in the wake of my visit to the Siberian and Far East regions of the Russian Federation.
					
					 I express deep thanks to the central and local leading officials and people for the warm reception and cordial hospitality accorded to us.
					
					 We once again witnessed the great vitality of the line and policy of the CPC, passing through Northeast China which conjures up unforgettable memory and more keenly felt the worth of the traditional DPRK-China friendship.
					
					 I am pleased that the DPRK-China relations are energetically developing in various fields in the spirit agreed upon in the course of our meetings and convinced that the DPRK-China friendship provided by the revolutionaries of the elder generation of the two countries at the cost of blood would invariably grow strong generation after generation in the conformity with the mutual interests and desire of the two peoples in the future, too.
					
					 I sincerely wish the fraternal Chinese people greater success in their struggle for building rich and powerful and harmonious socialism with Chinese characteristics under the correct leadership of the CPC.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Moldovan Acting President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Moldovan Acting President

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a message of greeting to Marian Lupu, acting president of Moldova, on its national holiday.
					
					 Kim in the message sent congratulations to the acting president and people of Moldova, wishing Moldova development and the people's welfare.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Greets Moldovan Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Greets Moldovan Foreign Minister

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Saturday sent a message of greeting to Yuri Lianke, foreign minister of Moldova, on its national day.
					
					 The message wished him success in his work.

articles.title: Russian Government Economic Delegation Flies Back
articles.content:
Russian Government Economic Delegation Flies Back 

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The Russian government economic delegation led by Minister of Regional Development Viktor Basargin, chairman of the Russian side to the DPRK-Russia Intergovernmental Committee for Cooperation in Trade, Economy, Science and Technology, left here today after participating in its 5th meeting.

articles.title: DPRK-Russia Friendship Comes Long Way
articles.content:
DPRK-Russia Friendship Comes Long Way

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- On March 17, Juche 38 (1949) the DPRK and Russia (the then Soviet Union) concluded an agreement on economic and cultural cooperation.
					
					 It was the first bilateral agreement President Kim Il Sung signed during his visit to Russia. 
					
					 After the conclusion of the agreement, the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Russia entered a new stage of development. 
					
					 The two countries have developed the economic and cultural cooperation and exchange in line with the agreement to meet the desire and demand of their people. 
					
					 In particular, the 21st century witnessed a meeting between General Secretary Kim Jong Il and Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, the then president of Russia, the adoption of the DPRK-Russia Joint Declaration and the DPRK-Russia Moscow Declaration, and the conclusion of the treaty of friendship, good-neighborliness and cooperation. The landmark events propelled the development of the bilateral relations. 
					
					 The DPRK and Russia have steadily improved the relations through cooperation and exchange in various fields in the spirit of the declarations and the treaty. 
					
					 The reconstruction projects of the Rajin-Khasan railway and Rajin Port were launched in October 2008, with the approach of the diamond anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Russia. They served as a sign of large-scale cooperation entering a practical stage in conformity with the interests common to the two countries' people. 
					
					 Famous Russian art troupes have come to the DPRK every year to give performances, delighting the Korean people and boosting friendship. 
					
					 Pyongyang and Moscow are cooperating with each other for a fair solution to major international issues, including peace and security in the Asia-Pacific region.  
					
					 Kim Jong Il's recent unofficial visit to the Siberian and Far East regions of the Russian Federation marked another important occasion in putting the bilateral friendship on a higher level.

articles.title: Far East Region of Russia, Witness to DPRK-Russia Friendship
articles.content:
Far East Region of Russia, Witness to DPRK-Russia Friendship

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The Far East region of Russia is the historic place associated with the inerasable footprints left by President Kim Il Sung during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 It was in the region that the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA), the Anti-Japanese Allied Army in Northeast China and the Soviet Far East forces developed their joint anti-Japanese actions, escalating them in width and depth.
					
					 Kim Il Sung spent a day in Khabarovsk on his way home after wrapping up his historic official goodwill visits to the former Soviet Union and socialist countries in Eastern Europe in summer of 1984. At that time, the President recollected with deep emotion the life in a training base of the Far East and the Khabarovsk Meeting during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 Khabarovsk became an important gathering place during the joint struggle waged by the KPRA and the Anti-Japanese Allied Army in Northeast China after forming International Allied Forces with the Soviet Army units in the Far East. It was there that cadres of Comintern, revolutionaries of Korea, the Soviet Union and China and commanders of armies met with one another and understood  each other  and sought orientation and ways of joint struggle.
					
					 The President said the Khabarovsk Meeting together with the Xiaohaerbaling Meeting marked an occasion in bringing about a new turn in the Korean revolution. The Khabarovsk meeting was an important meeting at which the contents and methods of the anti-Japanese armed struggle in the first half of the 1940s were defined  and this helped the Korean revolutionaries to strengthen the driving force for  the Korean revolution with firm faith of the country's liberation and actively meet the great event to come, he added.
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited several times the Far East region associated with the history of the revolutionary struggle of Kim Il Sung. By doing so, he left giant footprints for boosting the DPRK-Russia friendly relations. 
					
					 He cruised the River Amur in the Far East region in August of 2001, looking back with deep emotion upon the history of the anti-Japanese revolutionary leadership of the President in the region.
					
					 His visit to Siberia and the Far East region of Russia this year, the 10th anniversary of the adoption of the historic DPRK-Russia Moscow Declaration, made the Korean people recollect with deep emotion the visits of the peerlessly great men to the region once again.
					
					 The Korean people have particularly warm feelings towards the Far East region as it is witness to the history and tradition of the DPRK-Russia friendship.

articles.title: Vol. 11 of "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" (Enlarged Edition) Published
articles.content:
Vol. 11 of "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" (Enlarged Edition) Published

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out Vol. 11 of "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" (enlarged edition) which comprehensively deals with immortal classic works of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The book contains 35 works including speeches, talks and congratulatory letters he authored from August 1984 to March 1987.
					
					 The book contains "On Some Problems of Education in the Juche Idea", "The Juche Idea Is the idea that Carried Forward and Developed the Progressive Idea of Mankind" and other works. They indicate that the Juche idea is the man-centered philosophical idea and the guiding idea of the WPK and clarifies the theory on arming the party members and other working people with this idea.
					
					 The book contains "Let Us Eternally Glorify the Great Leader's Exploits Performed in Leading the Army" and "Let Us Further Strengthen the People's Army as Matchless Ranks" and other works indicating tasks for building well the Revolutionary Museum of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces so as to let servicepersons and people and foreigners know well about the feats the President performed in building the army and the tasks for building KPA into matchless ranks to counter the moves of the enemies for a new war. 
					
					There are in the book "Let Us Step Up the Three-Revolution Red Flag Movement", "For the Strengthening and Development of the Party and the Revolutionary Ranks and a Fresh Upsurge in the Construction of the Socialist Economy", "On Further Development of Science and Technology" and "On Improving and Strengthening Land Administration" and other works. They indicate ways for accelerating socialist construction through a mass movement involving all people.

articles.title: Swimming Games of Sports Contest among School Youth and Children for Jongilbong Prize Held
articles.content:
Swimming Games of Sports Contest among School Youth and Children for Jongilbong Prize Held 

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The swimming games of the 37th national sports contest among school youth and children for Jongilbong Prize took place at the swimming pool of the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace from August 23 to 27.
					
					 The contest brought together at least 400 boys and girls from across country. It was divided into groups of primary and secondary schools. 
					
					 Boys of Mangum Secondary School in Sariwon City and girls of Pyongyang Tonghung Secondary School came first in team standings in the group of secondary schools while boys of Pyongyang Janggyong Primary School and girls of Pyongyang Primary School No. 4  in the group of primary schools.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Visit to Russia Hailed as Historic Event
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Visit to Russia Hailed as Historic Event

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday editorially notes General Secretary Kim Jong Il's visit to Russia was a historic event as it greatly contributed to the Korean people's cause of building a great prosperous and powerful nation and the development of DPRK-Russia relations and the human cause of independence.
					
					 The indefatigable efforts and devotion made by him for boosting the ties of friendship between the two countries greatly inspire the peoples of the two countries and progressive humankind aspiring after independence, peace and friendship, it says, and continues:
					
					 By paying the historic visit to Russia he contributed to the regional development and world peace and security.
					
					 At the talks held between the top leaders of the two countries during his visit, there was a wide-ranging exchange of views on the issues of denuclearizing the Korean peninsula and ensuring the peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					They, at the same time, clarified the will of the two countries to oppose the high-handed and arbitrary practices in the international arena and establish a fair international order and thus contribute to safeguarding the peace and security of the region and the world.
					
					 At the talks the top leaders reached a consensus of views on resuming the six-party talks at an early date without any precondition and implementing the September 19 Joint Statement on the principle of simultaneous action and thereby accelerating the denuclearization of the Korean peninsula. This is a manifestation of the principled stands of the two countries.
					
					 The significant meeting and talks between the top leaders of the two countries marked an important milestone in boosting the relations of friendship and cooperation and good neighborliness between the two countries in line with the desire and aspiration of their peoples and turning Northeast Asia into a region of peace and cooperation.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's historic visit to Russia will be recorded as a great event in developing the DPRK-Russia friendship at a higher stage and opening a bright prospect for establishing sound international relations and accomplishing the cause of global independence.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Can Never Realize their Wild Ambition for Invading DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Can Never Realize their Wild Ambition for Invading DPRK

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The United States and the south Korean authorities claimed that UFG was to "make preparations to counter the provocations of the north" and "alliance was tightened" in this course but it was, in fact, dangerous war maneuvers staged under the simulated conditions of a war of aggression against the north. 
					
					 Minju Joson Saturday observes this in a bylined commentary.
					
					 It continues:
					
					 UFG clearly showed who on the Korean Peninsula is perpetrating military provocations.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the chiefs of staff of the puppet ground force and navy exercised the right to command the operations in the recent saber-rattling.
					
					 The U.S. is contemplating leaving land and marine operations in the war of aggression against the north to the south Korean puppet army for fear of the retaliatory strikes of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 In the final analysis, UFG proved once again that the south Korean puppet army is no more than cannon fodder of the U.S. forces.
					
					 It indicated the U.S. and south Korean authorities do not want peace on the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean trigger-happy forces dared not unleash a war of aggression against the north mainly because the DPRK built up its strong war deterrent for self-defense under the banner of Songun.
					
					 They will never be able to realize their wild ambition for invading the north.

articles.title: Arrest of Participants in Action against Naval Base Construction under Fire in S. Korea
articles.content:
Arrest of Participants in Action against Naval Base Construction under Fire in S. Korea

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The puppet police walked off inhabitants including the chief of Kangjong Village and five other civic activists, branding their action against the Jeju Naval Base construction as disturbance of the performance of their duty on August 24, according to south Korean Yonhap News.

articles.title: S. Korean Police Officer Testifies to Cause of Warship Cheonan Sinking
articles.content:
S. Korean Police Officer Testifies to Cause of Warship Cheonan Sinking

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The vice captain of a warship belonging to the puppet Maritime Police testified to the fact that warship Cheonan sank after running aground, according to CBS of south Korea on August 24.
					
					 He made such testimony at a trial of Sin Sang Chol, a member of the joint investigation team, who claimed that Cheonan sank after it ran aground.
					
					 Recalling that he received a message that Cheonan hit a rock, while sailing to rescue the ship, he said the Korean word Jwacho is usually used when a ship hit a rock.
					
					 It was first recorded in the report of the Maritime Police that the warship Cheonan ran aground, he added.

articles.title: UFG Condemned by Koreans in China
articles.content:
UFG Condemned by Koreans in China

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Yanbian Area Association of the General Association of Koreans in China and its branches and the Yanbian Area Youth Committee of the Association of Korean Youth in China was held in Yanji City, Jilin Province, China on August 23 to denounce the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group for staging large-scale war maneuvers for invading the DPRK.
					
					 At the meeting speakers expressed irrepressible resentment at the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers who staged UFG targeted against the DPRK despite the strong protest and denunciation of all fellow countrymen and the world peace-loving people.
					
					 The saber-rattling is an undisguised military threat to the DPRK and a blatant challenge to the DPRK as it is an extension of the warmongers' invariable anti-DPRK confrontation policy, they charged.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean conservative ruling forces talked about "dialogue" and "detente" whenever an opportunity presented itself. The recent saber-rattling brought to light their true colors as warmongers seeking only confrontation and war, they noted.
					
					 The reality goes to clearly prove that the group of traitors should be wiped out at an early date in order to improve the inter-Korean relations and achieve the peace on the Korean Peninsula, they stressed.

articles.title: UFG Joint Military Exercises under Fire
articles.content:
UFG Joint Military Exercises under Fire

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea released a statement on August 23 denouncing the U.S.-south Korea Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Panmunjom Mission of the Korean People's Army already strongly urged the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to cancel at once the projected UFG targeted against the DPRK.
					
					 The joint military maneuvers are large-scale war exercises to invade the north and provocative moves to disturb peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula. They are aimed at stoking the atmosphere of confrontation between the north and the south.
					
					 UFG is a replica of the bankrupt conspiratorial Cheonan warship sinking case of the U.S. and south Korean puppet group rejected by the international community.
					
					 The DPRK will decisively frustrate the open provocations of the enemies and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Internet Homepage of Guinean Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Internet Homepage of Guinean Organization

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on August 18 posted on its Internet homepage the full text of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution".
					
					The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Workers' Party of Korea's Songun revolutionary line, Songun politics, is a powerful political mode of the present era which inherited and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of attaching importance to arms and a scientific revolutionary line, a political mode which most correctly reflects the requirements of the times and the revolution. It also clarifies the validity, advantages and great vitality of the Songun politics.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Observed Abroad

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Bangladesh, India and Denmark between 17 and 21 to mark the 51st anniversary of General SecretaryKim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Displayed in the venues of the meetings were books and photos on the feats of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Present there were personages of the Bangladesh People's League, the Bangladesh Self-Reliance Research Center, the Indian Srilalmahal Group, the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association and masses. 
					
					 The president of the Bangladesh People's League said that Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership over five decades ago is a historic event of great significance in the struggle for accomplishing the DPRK's revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The chairman of the Indian Srilalmahal Group noted that Korea which was reduced to a colony of the Japanese imperialists as it was weak in its national power in the past has become a country with so powerful military capability that no one dares provoke thanks to the Songun politics enforced by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association said that all the achievements made in the DPRK were possible thanks to the results of the Songun politics enforced by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Meanwhile, The Indian Institute for Foreign Policy Studies, the CPS Global Consultation Company and the India-Swiss School held a lecture, photo exhibition and film show on August 18.

articles.title: Birthday of DPRK Marked
articles.content:
Birthday of DPRK Marked

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea issued bulletin No. 80 on the 63rd birthday of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 The bulletin carried a photo of General Secretary Kim Jong Il giving field guidance to the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex with an article titled "In a matter of just 14 years".
					
					 These words "In a matter of just 14 years" denote an extraordinarily rapid speed of economic development in the DPRK, the bulletin said, and went on:
					
					 The Korean War forced by the U.S. imperialists in the 1950s severely destroyed the economy of the young DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists perpetrated indiscriminate bombing and bombardment against this country, completely reducing cities and villages to debris during the war. And they blustered that the DPRK was not able to stand on its feet even in a hundred years.
					
					 But the Korean people completed the rehabilitation in a brief span of time and embarked upon carrying out an epochal-making task of industrialization.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung visited the workers of the Kangson Steel Works in December 1956, kindling the torch of the Chollima Movement and making it rage throughout the country. As a result, the socialist industrialization was realized in a matter of just 14 years. This was a high rate of growth unprecedented in the world history of economic development.
					
					 The Korean people could not but experience the worst trial in the closing period of the last century.
					
					 Taking advantage of the collapse of the socialist countries in Eastern Europe the imperialist allied forces led by the U.S. ran wild to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 It was against this backdrop that the DPRK successfully launched satellite Kwangmyongsong-1 by its own efforts and technology, heralding the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 The Korean people united close around leader Kim Jong Il turned out as one in the struggle for defending socialism and building a thriving nation.
					
					The Korean people will hit their target without fail in the near future and thus showcase history-making miracles once again before the whole world.
					
					 The DPRK is sure to reach the eminence of a thriving nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Leadership Marked
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Leadership Marked

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- A Nigerian organization and Finnish organ posted articles on Internet to mark the 51st anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea in an article posted on Internet homepage on August 11 said that Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership on August 25, 1960 provided a decisive guarantee for carrying forward the history and tradition of Songun in the DPRK generation after generation.
					
					 The article noted he has trained the Korean People's Army as an army fully prepared politically and ideologically and in military technique, adding socialist Korea has advanced along the road of victory under his Songun leadership.
					
					 The "Commune Forum" Information Agency of Finland in an article posted on Internet magazine on August 21 said General Secretary Kim Jong Il has performed great exploits in socialist construction and defence upbuilding, always being with President Kim Il Sung on the road of Songun leadership.
					
					 The DPRK's cause of building a thriving nation is sure to triumph as long as there are the wise Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il and the KPA.

articles.title: Finnish Personage on Justice of Songun Politics
articles.content:
Finnish Personage on Justice of Songun Politics

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, on August 21 issued a statement to mark the 51st anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 He said that the Korean people could firmly defend socialism from the ceaseless military provocations and threat of aggression of the U.S. imperialists thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The justice of the Songun politics can find a clear manifestation in that the Korean People's Army and the Korean people have bravely met all challenges of the U.S. imperialists with capability for self-defence bolstered thanks to the Songun politics, he noted, and went on:
					
					 The Songun politics is the most just and great political mode firmly guaranteeing the DPRK's independence in politics, self-support in economy and self-reliance in defence.
					
					 The Finland-Korea Society is firmly convinced that the Korean people would build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation without fail true to the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il, he concluded.

articles.title: Hu Jintao Stresses Need to Push Forward Scientific Development of Cadre Training
articles.content:
Hu Jintao Stresses Need to Push Forward Scientific Development of Cadre Training

					 Beijing, August 26 (KCNA) -- Hu Jintao, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, in a preface of a textbook on cadre training published recently stressed the need to push forward the scientific development of cadre training.
					
					 Noting that to educate and train cadres is a primary work for building ranks of cadres with high qualifications, he, therefore, underlined the need to put main emphasis on promoting the application of the theme of scientific development and making a switchover in the mode of economic development and combine them with reality to create new things.
					
					 He called upon senior cadres at all levels to work hard to implement the scientific outlook on development in various fields of economic and social development and achieve remarkable and rapid development of economy and society and thus contribute to building a comprehensively well-off society and pushing ahead with the socialist modernization drive.

articles.title: China Supports Anti-Terrorism Cooperation: Spokesman
articles.content:
China Supports Anti-Terrorism Cooperation: Spokesman

					 Beijing, August 26 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Chinese Foreign Ministry said Thursday that China supports and takes part in the international anti-terrorism cooperation. 
					
					 Speaking to reporters as regards the 2010 state report on anti-terrorism released by the U.S., Ma Zhaoxu clarified the Chinese government's consistent position of intensifying international cooperation in anti-terrorism combat, based on the UN Charter, international law and publicly recognized rules of international relations, and opposing any attempt to connect specific states, nations and religion with terrorism. -0-
					
					 China's concern for the Islamic movement in eastern Turkestan should be respected, he said. China opposes double standards.

articles.title: Service Sector Workers Urged to Serve People Faithfully in China
articles.content:
Service Sector Workers Urged to Serve People Faithfully in China 

					 Beijing, August 26 (KCNA) -- Li Yuanchao, head of the Organization Department of the C.C., the Communist Party of China, said people in the service sector should become fine models in enjoying praise from the popular masses.
					
					 Speaking at a recent video conference, Li stressed that service establishments and their party members should serve the people faithfully so that they can feel satisfaction.

articles.title: China Calls for Promoting National Defense Mobilization
articles.content:
China Calls for Promoting National Defense Mobilization

					 Beijing, August 26 (KCNA) -- Liang Guanglie, Chinese state councilor and minister of National Defense, called for promoting a scientific development of national defense mobilization, true to a new intention of the Communist Party and government.
					
					 Addressing the 6th Plenary Session of the Beijing Military District Committee of National Defense Mobilization held in Inner Mongolian Autonomous Region on Tuesday, Liang said organizations at all levels should have a correct understanding of the development direction, main principles and major tasks of national defense mobilization and make efforts to open a new phase in this work.

articles.title: National Invention Exhibition Held in China
articles.content:
National Invention Exhibition Held in China

					 Beijing, August 26 (KCNA) -- The 20th National Invention Exhibition was held in Weihai City, China's Shandong Province, from Aug. 19 to 22.
					
					 1,600 inventions of various kinds made throughout the country in recent years were on show at the exhibition.

articles.title: Russia Calls for High Responsibility for Juvenile Camping
articles.content:
Russia Calls for High Responsibility for Juvenile Camping

					 Moscow, August 26 (KCNA) -- Russian President Dmitri Medvedev said all the organizations in charge of juvenile camping should have a strong sense of responsibility for this work, not seeking profits only.
					
					 At a recent meeting with the governor of the Kraslodar Territory, the President said it is necessary to strictly supervise the observation of all the existing rules concerning juvenile camping and call all violators to account.
					
					 "This is not only a matter of money but a matter of a strong sense of responsibility. That's why we should spare no effect and money for this work", he added.

articles.title: Iran's Measures against Cyber Warfare
articles.content:
Iran's Measures against Cyber Warfare

					 Tehran, August 26 (KCNA) -- Iran is planning to stage a drill for foiling the enemy's cyber warfare.
					
					 The objective of the drill is to boost the capacity to cope with the cyber warfare and examine the preparations of relevant organs and units, a press report said. This was made by the chairman of the Civil Defense Committee of the country on August 21.

articles.title: More NATO Soldiers Killed in Afghanistan
articles.content:
More NATO Soldiers Killed in Afghanistan

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- More NATO soldiers in Afghanistan met deaths due to the attack of the resistance forces of the country.
					
					 Two NATO soldiers were killed in explosions in Afghanistan's restive southern region on August 22 and 23.
					
					 Over 400 NATO soldiers, most of them Americans, have been killed in Afghanistan since the beginning of this year.

articles.title: 5 Pakistanis Killed by U.S. Drones
articles.content:
5 Pakistanis Killed by U.S. Drones

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The U.S. forces in Afghanistan are killing Pakistanis under the pretext of "anti-terrorism".
					
					 At least five people were killed as U.S. drones fired four missiles in Pakistan's northwest tribal area of North Waziristan Monday night.

articles.title: Government's Emergency-tackling Capacity Disapproved in Japan
articles.content:
Government's Emergency-tackling Capacity Disapproved in Japan

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Public distrust of the government's capacity of dealing with emergency is growing in Japan.
					
					 According to the results of a poll made by the Japanese newspaper Mainichi Shimbun throughout the country some time ago, 70 percent of the respondents disapproved the Cabinet's countermeasures to the Fukushima Atomic Power Plant disaster.

articles.title: Jordan's Exports Rise
articles.content:
Jordan's Exports Rise 

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Jordan's exports rose by 16.7 percent in the first half of 2011, compared to the same period last year, according to figures from the Department of Statistics on Tuesday.

articles.title: Algeria's Annual Inflation
articles.content:
Algeria's Annual Inflation

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The annual inflation rate in Algeria rose to 3.6 percent in July, up 0.1 percent last month, but down from 3.7 percent in May and 3.9 percent in April, according to a statement issued Tuesday by the National Statistics Office (ONS).

articles.title: Natural Disasters in Nigeria, Puerto Rico
articles.content:
Natural Disasters in Nigeria, Puerto Rico 

					Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Heavy rain hit the northern area of Nigeria on August 21, killing 10 people and forcing at least 1 800 to evacuate. About 150 dwelling houses were destroyed as of August 22. Hundreds of domestic animals were carried away by flood.
					
					 Storm swept Puerto Rico on August 22, accompanied by heavy rain. About 770 inhabitants were evacuated, electricity supply to the residential quarters suspended and roads blocked.

articles.title: Myanmar Combats Drug Trafficking
articles.content:
Myanmar Combats Drug Trafficking

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Myanmar is directing efforts to combat drug trafficking.
					
					 The Myanmar authorities destroyed a total of 7 049 hectares of illicit poppy plantation across the country in the 2010-11 poppy cultivation season, according to the central anti-drug authorities Monday.
					
					 In July this year, the Myanmar authorities exposed 172 drug-related cases, punishing 280 people.
					
					 Among the seizure in connection with the cases during the month were 48.49 kilograms (kg) of opium, 0.44 kg of heroin, 22.90 kg of marijuana and 0.015 kg of ephedrine as well as 610 663 stimulate tablets.

articles.title: Accidents in Algeria, India
articles.content:
Accidents in Algeria, India

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- One was killed and 30 others were injured in a collision between a passenger train and another of commodity, which occurred in the northern area of Algeria on Monday morning.
					
					 A truck with lots of people aboard overturned in the northern area of India on the same day, leaving 40 people dead and 12 others wounded.

articles.title: Earthquakes Hit South Pacific Countries
articles.content:
Earthquakes Hit South Pacific Countries

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- An earthquake measuring 5.1 Richter scale jolted Timor-Leste on Monday evening.
					
					 The quake happened with epicenter at 315 km northeast Dili.
					
					 An earthquake measuring 5.0 on the Richter scale jolted Fiji and Vanuatu respectively on Monday.

articles.title: Europeans' Confidence in Economy Drops
articles.content:
Europeans' Confidence in Economy Drops

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Consumer confidence in the 17-member eurozone dropped sharply in August, according to a flash estimate of the European Commission released on Tuesday. Consumer confidence indicator of the eurozone dropped from minus 11.2 in July to minus 16.6 in August.

articles.title: Greenhouse Gas Emission Increases in Netherlands
articles.content:
Greenhouse Gas Emission Increases in Netherlands

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- The emission of greenhouse gases which causes global warming is increasing in Netherlands, sparking off great concern.
					
					 In 2010 the emissions of greenhouse gases were six percent higher from the year before, the Dutch Government Central Bureau for Statistics reported on Monday.

articles.title: Crimes in Japan, Australia
articles.content:
Crimes in Japan, Australia

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- A 57-year-old unemployed man has been arrested on suspected murder of his wife and son in Osaka Prefecture, Japan on August 23.
					
					 Meanwhile, six gun-related crimes have been recently occurred in the western area of Sydney City, Australia, sparking off great uneasiness and horror among people.

articles.title: National Day Observed in Ukraine
articles.content:
National Day Observed in Ukraine

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- National day was marked in Ukraine on August 24.
					
					 President Viktor Yanukovych in a speech on this occasion said that the government will improve the well-being of Ukrainian people in the nearest future, strengthen the power organs to terminate irregularities and corruption and build more powerful Ukraine.
					
					 There was a parade of thousands of Ukrainians in Kiev on the day.
					
					 Concerts, flower festivals and other colorful events took place in different places.

articles.title: Sudanese President Clarifies Stand to Strive to Settle Clashes
articles.content:
Sudanese President Clarifies Stand to Strive to Settle Clashes

					 Pyongyang, August 27 (KCNA) -- Sudanese President Omar al-Bashir in an interview with a TV on Tuesday clarified the stand to work hard to settle the clashes.
					
					 The government recently declared a unilateral cease-fire in South Kordofan State which has been witnessing the clashes with Southern Sudan, he said. It was part of the government's endeavors to resolve the crisis.
					
					 He reiterated the importance of preventing foreign organizations from entering the clashes-hit area.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il pasa la provincia china de Jilin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il pasa la provincia china de Jilin 

					　Pyongyang, 27 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, paso el dia 27 por la provincia de Jilin de China.
					
					　El arribo hoy por la manana a la ciudad de Tonghua de dicha provincia donde esta registrada la imborrable historia revolucionaria del Presidente Kim Il Sung. 
					
					　Durante la lucha revolucionaria antijaponesa, especificamente, a principios de la decada de 1930, el Presidente realizo alli la lucha conjunta con una unidad de tropas independientes por lograr el frente unido nacional antijapones del pueblo coreano. 
					
					　Despues de la liberacion de Corea, el habia visitado en diciembre de 1950 y septiembre de 1964 la provincia de Jilin donde se enraizo la amistad Corea-China.  
					
					　Cuando llego a la estacion ferroviaria de Tonghua el tren en que viajaba Kim Jong Il, le acogieron cordialmente el secretario del Comite Provincial del Partido Comunista de China en Jilin, Sun Zhengcai, el gobernador de la misma provincia, Wang Yulin, el secretario del Comite Municipal del PCCh en Tonghua, Liu Baowei, el alcalde de Tonghua, Tian Wolin y otros cuadros directivos del partido y el gobierno de la provincia y la ciudad. 
					
					　Ninos chinos dieron el saludo de calida bienvenida a Kim Jong Il entregandole ramos de flores. 
					
					　Entre sus acompanantes figuran Kim Yong Chun, miembro del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, Kang Sok Ju, miembro del BP del CC del PTC y viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yang Gon, Pak To Chun y Thae Jong Su, miembros suplentes del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC, Pak Pong Ju, primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, O Su Yong, secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Norte, Ji Jae Ryong, embajador coreano en China, y Ri Ki Bom, consul general coreano en Shenyang.
					
					　Llegaron tambien con el los cuadros chinos del centro como el jefe del Departamento de Enlace Internacional del CC del PCCh, Wang Jiarui, y el ministro de Ferrocarriles, Sheng Guangzu.
					
					　Tras intercambiar saludos con los cuadros que le recibieron, Kim Jong Il visito guiado por ellos la Corporacion Ltd. de Vino de Tonghua. 
					
					　Sobre todo, recordo con emocion las nobles huellas de la visita del Presidente Kim Il Sung a esa compania, realizada hace casi medio siglo. 
					
					　Recorrio varios puntos de la compania, inclusive el deposito de vino y la exposicion de productos, averiguando en detalles el historial y el sistema de produccion de ella, el modo de conservacion y sabor de los productos, y deseo mayor avance en el trabajo de esta empresa para el fomento del bienestar del pueblo. 
					
					　El comite del partido y el gobierno de la provincia de Jilin ofrecieron este dia un banquete opiparo en honor de Kim Jong Il. 
					
					　Fue invitado a la recepcion el Dirigente.
					
					　Sun Zhengcai dijo en su discurso que es un privilegio y honor de Jilin tener en esta provincia al camarada Kim Jong Il tres veces en un ano y pico y expreso la maxima consideracion y calurosa bienvenida a este en nombre del comite del partido, el gobierno y la poblacion de la provincia de Jilin. 
					
					　Todo el pueblo chino, incluso los habitantes de la provincia de Jilin, esta complacido de los exitos que alcanza ultimamente el pueblo coreano en su lucha por conmemorar significativamente el centenario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, considerandolos como los propios, apunto y expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que bajo la orientacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea encabezado por el camarada Kim Jong Il, el pueblo coreano lograra sin falta su victoria fulminante en la lucha por construir un Estado prospero socialista. 
					
					　El comite del partido, el gobierno y la poblacion de la provincia de Jilin desempenaran un papel mas importante para continuar y desarrollar generacion tras generacion la amistad China-Corea junto con el pueblo coreano, destaco.
					
					　Acto seguido, se ofrecio una funcion artistica preparada para Kim Jong Il. 
					
					　Los ejecutantes pusieron en la escena el coro femenino "Olas de Honghe", las canciones coreanas como la obra maestra "Regazo de la patria" y el coro mixto "Cabalgamos en Chollima", y otras piezas. 
					
					　La funcion causo el desborde de aplausos del publico. 
					
					　Este dia, el comite del partido y el gobierno popular de la provincia dedicaron presente a       Kim Jong Il.
					
					　Kim Jong Il expreso agradecimiento por la calida bienvenida y trato hospitalario del comite del partido, el gobierno y la poblacion de la provincia de Jilin y les deseo nuevos exitos en la lucha por alcanzar la prosperidad del pais y el bienestar del pueblo bajo la guia del PCCh. 
					
					　Este dia, el termino su larga travesia por la region nordeste de China y partio hacia la patria donde le espera el entranable pueblo coreano. 
					
					　Antes de partida, intercambio saludos de despedida con Wang Jiarui, Sheng Guangzu y otros cuadros directivos del centro, que le guiaron con sinceridad en todo el trayecto de visita, y con los cuadros del partido y el gobierno de la provincia y la ciudad como Sun Zhengcai y Wang Yulin. 
					
					　Cuando el tren del Dirigente partio de la estacion ferroviaria fronteriza, los cuadros chinos le despidieron cordialmente con sus manos alzadas. 
					
					　El paso y la visita de Kim Jong Il a la region nordeste de China se realizaron exitosamente bajo la atencion especial del Secretario General Hu Jintao, el partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de China. 
					
					　El expreso su satisfaccion por el resultado de la visita y manifesto su sincero agradecimiento por el trato atento y hospitalario del CC del PCCh, el Consejo de Estado y los cuadros directivos de la region autonoma de Mongolia Interior, las provincias de Heilongjiang y Jilin y los habitantes de estas localidades. 
					
					　El paso y la visita de Kim Jong Il a la region nordeste de China se registraran en la cronica de la amistad Corea-China como otro importante hito que ha demostrado plenamente las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos partidos y los dos paises y consolidado los lazos de amistad entre ambos pueblos.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il regresa a la patria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il regresa a la patria

					　Pyongyang, 27 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, regreso el dia 27 a la patria junto con sus acompanantes tras concluir exitosamente su visita a la Federacion Rusa y a la Republica Popular China. 
					
					　Le recibieron cordialmente en la estacion ferroviaria fronteriza Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del Buro Politico y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, y otros funcionarios directivos del partido y el ejercito. 
					
					　Ellos felicitaron calurosamente al Dirigente, quien regreso a la patria sano y salvo, por su exitosa visita al extranjero dedicandole un cesto de flores en representacion de todo el ejercito y pueblo.
					
					　En el largo trayecto de mas de 20 mil ries (10 ries equivalen a 4 kilometros) de su visita, el realizo imborrables proezas en sus actividades exteriores a ser registradas en la historia de prosperidad de la patria socialista. 
					
					　El Dirigente se reunio con los funcionarios directivos del partido y el ejercito que le acogieron y envio un saludo cordial a todos los entranables habitantes de la patria.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia mensaje de agradecimiento a Hu Jintao
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia mensaje de agradecimiento a Hu Jintao 

					　Pyongyang, 27 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 27 un mensaje de agradecimiento a Hu Jintao, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la Republica Popular China, en el camino de vuelta a la patria tras concluir su visita a la region nordeste de China. 
					
					　El texto sigue:
					
					　Tuve la oportunidad de visitar la region nordeste de la Republica Popular China en el trayecto de regreso a la patria desde mi visita a las regiones de Siberia y Lejano Oriente de la Federacion Rusa. En este camino de vuelta a la patria, les envio mi caluroso saludo a Vd., a intimos camaradas del colectivo de direccion central del Partido Comunista de China y al hermano pueblo chino. 
					
					　Expreso profundo agradecimiento a los cuadros del centro y regiones y a los habitantes chinos que nos acogieron y trataron con hospitalidad.
					
					　Al pasar por la region nordeste de China que atesora inolvidables recuerdos, volvimos a ser testigos de la gran vitalidad de las lineas y politicas del Partido Comunista de China y a sentir en lo profundo del corazon lo precioso de la tradicional amistad Corea-China.
					
					　Satisfecho de que las relaciones Corea-China se desarrollen animadamente en varias ramas segun el espiritu de los acuerdos alcanzados en nuestros encuentros, manifiesto la conviccion de que en el futuro tambien, la amistad Corea-China, preparada con sangre por los revolucionarios de veterana generacion de los dos paises, se fortalecera y se desarrollara invariablemente generacion tras generacion conforme a los intereses y deseos comunes de ambos pueblos. 
					
					　Deseo de todo corazon que bajo la correcta guia del Partido Comunista de China, el hermano pueblo chino logre mayores exitos en la lucha por construir el socialismo prospero y armonioso con peculiaridades chinas.
